layout: article

<!-- Code generated by generrordocs.go; DO NOT EDIT. -->

```
MisplacedLabel occurs when a break or continue label is not on a for,
switch, or select statement.

Example:
 func f() {
 L:
 	a := []int{1,2,3}
 	for _, e := range a {
 		if e > 10 {
 			break L
 		}
 		println(a)
 	}
 }
```
